SENT.plain: Intracardiac thrombus is a rare manifestation of Behcet's disease
OBSERVATION: we report the case of a 60 year old male patient with BehÃ§et's disease who presented with dyspnea and haemoptysis
CT angiography and echocardiography was performed allowing the identification of right heart thrombus associated with pulmonary artery aneurysm
The outcome was favourable with medical management
CONCLUSION: Intracardiac thrombus is a rare complication of Behcet's disease, but the diagnosis should be sought early in order to allow medical management to be considered
